title: Broken Wings
description: Nothing left to lose...After a turbulent start, Livy is almost done with her senior year of high school. However, the approaching final exams are the least of her worries, with a new and dangerous threat lurking in the shadows. The undisclosed people from Gregory's past begin to haunt the two of them, threatening everything Livy knows to be true. Struggling to survive, Livy must make a choice: return to the life she knew or fight and risk everything she has left. When you've lost so much, how much more is worth losing?
author: Paulina Ulrich
